roleset.name: cover with lipstick
roleset.note: LIPSTICK-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire. (from lipstick.01-v)

role.descr: makeup artist, agent putting on lipstick
lips, or other entity being covered with lipstick
lipstick type, or art drawn with lipstick

example.name: No lipstick mentioned
example.text: The clown had lipsticked circles on his cheeks.

example.name: With resulting state/secondary predication
example.text: He lipsticked his lips black as ink but nobody so much as smirked.
